synopsis.text: Eiji Kitahama joins his high school's drama club with dreams of gaining popularity like the harem protagonists in his favorite manga. Rin Nanakura, an underclassman who develops feelings for Eiji, tries presenting various personas around him in hopes of getting his attention. Though the acts delight Eiji, Rin struggles to drop the fa√ßades and express her true self. As their friendship in the club blossoms, Eiji remains oblivious to Rin's advances. Will her colorful performances ever break through to his heart, or is she doomed to hide behind masks forever? This heartwarming anime follows two drama club members as they explore the spectacle of acting while navigating the reality of adolescent romance.
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
